product_name: DysonSpecial Edition Airstrait Straightener in Red Velvet and Gold
summary: SummaryLimited edition Dyson Airstrait™ in Red velvet and Gold includes a complimentary Presentation case. Dries and straightens simultaneously from wet to dry. Engineered to create a natural straight finish for multiple hair types. No hot plates. No heat damage.¹ Your routine, simplified.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces time spent drying and styling by an average of 25%.⁴Dries and straightens hair simultaneously to take hair from wet to a finished look – with one machine.Uses high-velocity airflow to straighten hair as it dries. Air is precisely heated and projected evenly through the tress as you style – with no heat damage.¹Dyson's machine senses when hair is between the arms and automatically drops to low airflow when it's not – for quieter, more efficient styling.Engineered to maintain hair strength and protect shine.³FeaturesAirflow is projected downwards at a 45° angle to create the tension needed to align hair for a smooth end style – with less damage and breakage.²Glass bead thermistors, located in the machine arms, regulate airflow temperature up to 30 times per second to prevent heat damage and protect hair’s natural shine.Dyson Hyperdymium™ motor has a 13-blade impeller that spins up to 106,000rpm, propelling 11.9 liters of air through the machine per second. This generates 3.6kPa of air pressure, powerful enough to straighten hair as it dries.LCD screen features a high-definition color display that shows airflow and temperature settings for easy reference when styling.Lock feature allows you to slide the button to lock and unlock the arms of your machine. Use with the arms locked to gently pre-dry hair and create volume from the roots.Auto-pause occurs after three seconds of inactivity. Your machine will automatically pause to save energy. Simply move the machine to restart the airflow.IncludesDyson Airstrait™Non-slip heat matLimited edition Presentation case to protect and neatly store your Dyson Airstrait™. Finished in black with a red stripe, cushioned with soft fabric and with a removable lid that is also a non-slip mat for your Airstrait™.Item 2644323How To UseStraightening from wet:Start with towel-dried hair and select Wet mode. Select maximum airflow and high temperature.Lock arms and rough dry the roots.Once roots are dry, unlock arms and select desired airflow and temperature. Straighten and style damp hair in sections.Straightening from dry:Select Dry mode to touch-up or refresh your style. Select desired airflow and temperature, Boost mode is available if required.Straighten hair in sections.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: dries fast!
reviews.comments: I love that this doesn't damage my hair and it dries it quickly! I will still use a straightener to shape up some places that I like curved around my face. My only issue is the filter, located at the base where the cord starts, will sometimes slide down causing it to shut down *as it should. I wish that piece was more secure.
